social.thread

Class ThreadMenu

  • java.lang.Object
    • social.thread.ThreadMenu

  • public class ThreadMenu
extends java.lang.Object
    The ThreadMenu class interacts with the user on the View a Thread Page
    Version:
    1.4 07 Apr 2020
    Author:
    Wa Thone

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ThreadMenu(Thread thread, User loggedInUser)
      Creates a ThreadMenu object with the specified thread and loggedInUser

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void dislikeThread()
      If the user has not disliked the thread before, adds the user's dislike to the thread.

      Displays the View a Thread Page, input choices, and prompt

      Displays the specified List of Reactions (likes or dislikes) in the format: .
      void displayThread()
      Displays the thread text, comments, who liked and disliked the thread on the page
      char killThread()
      Deletes the thread completely from database if it was posted by the user.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ThreadMenu

        public ThreadMenu(Thread thread,
                  User loggedInUser)
        Creates a ThreadMenu object with the specified thread and loggedInUser
        Parameters:
        thread - the Thread object that is being viewed
        loggedInUser - the User object of the logged in user

    • Method Detail

      • display

        public void display()
        Displays the View a Thread Page, input choices, and prompt

      • readOption

        public char readOption()
        Takes in user's input choice and invoke corresponding methods
        Returns:
        'M' when the user chooses to go back to Main Menu

      • displayThread

        public void displayThread()
        Displays the thread text, comments, who liked and disliked the thread on the page

      • displayReactions

        public void displayReactions(java.util.List<Reaction> likesOrDislikes)
        Displays the specified List of Reactions (likes or dislikes) in the format: . Full name (username)
        Parameters:
        likesOrDislikes - the List of Reaction objects of likes or dislikes

      • killThread

        public char killThread()
        Deletes the thread completely from database if it was posted by the user. Otherwise, the thread is removed from the user's wall only.
        Returns:
        'M' if the post was deleted successfully. Otherwise, return 'K' to stay on the page.

      • replyThread

        public void replyThread(java.util.Scanner sc)
        Takes in user's input as reply to the thread, and add the reply to the thread.
        Parameters:
        sc - the scanner that takes in user's input

      • likeThread

        public void likeThread()
        If the user has not liked the thread before, adds the user's like to the thread. Otherwise. removes the user's like from the thread.

      • dislikeThread

        public void dislikeThread()
        If the user has not disliked the thread before, adds the user's dislike to the thread. Otherwise. removes the user's dislike from the thread.
